description: [Serf](http://www.serfdom.io/) is a decentralized solution for service discovery and orchestration that is lightweight, highly available, and fault tolerant.
ohloh_description: The serf library is a C-based HTTP client library built upon the Apache Portable Runtime (APR) library. It multiplexes connections, running the read/write communication asynchronously. Memory copies and transformations are kept to a minimum to provide high performance operation.
name: Serf
